about_the_game:
Season Pass 2 enriches your Kakarot experience with thrilling story arcs, powerful attacks, and soul emblems. Whether you’re a seasoned warrior or a newcomer, these DLCs promise excitement, nostalgia, and epic battles!

• BARDOCK - Alone Against Fate

In this gripping DLC, players step into the shoes of Bardock, Goku’s Saiyan father. Bardock valiantly fought alone to protect the Saiyan home planet from Lord Frieza's cruelty. Engage in intense battles, uncover secrets, and witness the tragic fate that befell the Saiyan race.
  • New Playable Character: Bardock
  • New Skills: Riot Javelin, Final Spirit Cannon

• 23rd World Tournament

Relive the legendary World Martial Arts Tournament, where Earth’s strongest fighters clash. Compete against formidable opponents, hone your skills, and aim for victory. The stakes are high, and the battles are electrifying.
  • New Playable Characters: Goku (The 23rd World Tournament Saga), Tien Shinhan
  • New Skills: First-Strike Kamehameha, Dragon Assault

• Goku’s Next Journey

Embark on an epic adventure as Goku meets Uub in this DLC. The wish made 10 years ago is now granted. Face challenges, unlock new abilities, and experience the emotional journey of Goku and Uub.
  • New Playable Characters: Goku (Goku's Next Journey), Pan
  • New Skills: Dragon Flash, Transcendent Kamehameha

After completing Goku's Next Journey, you can play the Saga of Two Saiyans in extra mode, where Goku has a fateful encounter with his rival, Vegeta. In preparation for his match with Vegeta, Goku recalls the desperate battles he's had against the most formidable opponents from his past!

Upon completing Saga of Two Saiyans, the new skills Dragon Flash and Transcendent Kamehameha will unlock, as well as The Ultra Tough Training Ground. Ascend to level 300 and rematch Vegeta and other iconic opponents in Training Ground!

Content can be played without clearing the Main Story.
detailed_description:
Season Pass 2 enriches your Kakarot experience with thrilling story arcs, powerful attacks, and soul emblems. Whether you’re a seasoned warrior or a newcomer, these DLCs promise excitement, nostalgia, and epic battles!

• BARDOCK - Alone Against Fate

In this gripping DLC, players step into the shoes of Bardock, Goku’s Saiyan father. Bardock valiantly fought alone to protect the Saiyan home planet from Lord Frieza's cruelty. Engage in intense battles, uncover secrets, and witness the tragic fate that befell the Saiyan race.
  • New Playable Character: Bardock
  • New Skills: Riot Javelin, Final Spirit Cannon

• 23rd World Tournament

Relive the legendary World Martial Arts Tournament, where Earth’s strongest fighters clash. Compete against formidable opponents, hone your skills, and aim for victory. The stakes are high, and the battles are electrifying.
  • New Playable Characters: Goku (The 23rd World Tournament Saga), Tien Shinhan
  • New Skills: First-Strike Kamehameha, Dragon Assault

• Goku’s Next Journey

Embark on an epic adventure as Goku meets Uub in this DLC. The wish made 10 years ago is now granted. Face challenges, unlock new abilities, and experience the emotional journey of Goku and Uub.
  • New Playable Characters: Goku (Goku's Next Journey), Pan
  • New Skills: Dragon Flash, Transcendent Kamehameha

After completing Goku's Next Journey, you can play the Saga of Two Saiyans in extra mode, where Goku has a fateful encounter with his rival, Vegeta. In preparation for his match with Vegeta, Goku recalls the desperate battles he's had against the most formidable opponents from his past!

Upon completing Saga of Two Saiyans, the new skills Dragon Flash and Transcendent Kamehameha will unlock, as well as The Ultra Tough Training Ground. Ascend to level 300 and rematch Vegeta and other iconic opponents in Training Ground!

Content can be played without clearing the Main Story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon HD 7950
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280X

*languages with full audio support
